duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and expand relationships with strategically important large customers.
Serve as the Strategic Account Manager and represent the entire range of company products and services to assigned customers.
Lead the customer account planning cycle and ensure assigned customers' needs and expectations are met by the company.
Manage the successful delivery of projects for assigned accounts.
Utilize One Network’s Hybrid Agile Methodology to track and manage project performance and analyze the completion of short- and long-term goals.
Outline work schedules, assign duties and responsibilities, and scope of authority for project leadership and staff.
Serve as the interface with the Government Contracting Officer (CO), the contract level Contracting Officer's Representative (COR).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree (or equivalent experience) in a related field. PMP Certification desired. Must have a current or recent security clearance (SECRET or better)
